items.title: Rose Pizza
items.description: A classic New York slice at Rose Pizza in Penn Station.

items.title: NY Pizza Suprema
items.description: Compare another legendary slice at NY Pizza Suprema just steps away.

items.title: Times Square
items.description: Take in the neon lights and nonstop energy of Times Square.

items.title: Central Park
items.description: Stroll through Central Park's iconic paths and landmarks.

items.title: The Met
items.description: Explore 5000 years of art at the Metropolitan Museum of Art.

items.title: 9/11 Memorial
items.description: Pay your respects at the solemn 9/11 Memorial pools.

items.title: Eataly
items.description: Browse gourmet Italian markets and grab bites at Eataly.

items.title: Pier 25 Mini Golf
items.description: End the day with a fun round of mini golf right on the Hudson River.

items.title: The MoMA
items.description: See modern masterpieces at the Museum of Modern Art.

items.title: Sal & Carmine's
items.description: Grab a beloved Upper West Side slice at Sal & Carmine's.

items.title: Mama's Too!
items.description: Taste inventive square slices at Mama's Too!.

items.title: American Museum of Natural History
items.description: Discover dinosaurs and dioramas at the American Museum of Natural History.

items.title: Carmine's
items.description: Enjoy family-style Italian classics at Carmine's.

items.title: Stranger Things: The First Shadow
items.description: Experience the Stranger Things prequel live on Broadway.

items.title: Anita Gelato
items.description: Finish with artisanal scoops at Anita Gelato.

items.title: All American
items.description: Bite into classic burgers at All American Drive-In.

items.title: Amityville Horror House
items.description: Snap photos of the infamous Amityville Horror House exterior.

items.title: Ravagh Persian Grill
items.description: Savor flavorful kebabs at Ravagh Persian Grill.

items.title: Movie Night
items.description: Wind down the evening with a relaxed movie night.

items.title: Statue of Liberty Tour
items.description: Ferry out to Liberty Island to tour the Statue of Liberty.

items.title: John's of Bleecker
items.description: Eat coal-fired pies at John's of Bleecker Street.

items.title: Ceres
items.description: Will this pizza be as good as Dave Portnoy says?

items.title: Chinatown
items.description: Explore vibrant streets and shops in Chinatown.

items.title: Szechuan Mountain House
items.description: Challenge your palate with fiery dishes at Szechuan Mountain House.

items.title: Summit One
items.description: Catch sunset views from Summit One Vanderbilt observatory.

items.title: Sagamore Hill Tour
items.description: Visit Theodore Roosevelt's Sagamore Hill estate.

items.title: New York Panini
items.description: Have a quick panini lunch at New York Panini.

items.title: Escape Room
items.description: Test teamwork with an immersive escape-room game.
